item.title: Photobomb HTB Walkthrough
item.author: emdwyer
item.description: Introduction An easy rated machine, and one of my first on HTB that was recently retired. This box was pwned before I started using MarkText and adding in screenshots to my markdown notes, so I’ve only captured STDOUT here, and the entire write up is boring plain text.. sorry. As always, I use Parrot OS Security Edition in a VirtualBox VM, with the OpenVPN client to connect to the HackTheBox VPN.
